name: Kyber Network Crystal Legacy
public_notice: Hi team, we have mapped the markest for Crypto.com to Kyber Network Crystal (KNC). Thank you!

description.ko:
이더리움 블록체인기반의 스마트 컨트랙트기능을 중점으로 개발한 플랫폼
거래소, 대리결제, 파생상품, 크로스체인지급결제 등의 기능을 제공할 수 있는 환경
특히 다른 종류의 코인을 즉각 환전하여 타 종류의 코인을 지급받기 원하는 상대에게 지불할 수 있는 크로스체인 지급결제환경이 가장 주목을 받고 있음
이더리움 개발자 비탈릭 부테린이 고문으로 재직 중 

가치

현재 중앙집권적인 거래소를 대체하는 블록체인 기반 네트워크를 통해서 즉각적이고 신뢰성이 있는 코인 간 거래가 가능하도록 하는 것을 목표로 삼고 있으며 특히 상호 다른 종류의 코인이나 토큰도 지급 결제가 가능하도록 즉각적인 호환성을 바탕으로 지연 없는 환전이 가능한 시스템까지 고려를 하고 있으며 이더리움의 개발자 비탈릭이 고문으로 있는 몇 안되는 프로젝트 중 하나입니다.

ico_data.short_desc: On-chain, instant and liquid platform for exchange and payment service
ico_data.description: KyberNetwork is a new system which allows the exchange and conversion of digital assets. They provide rich payment APIs and a new contract wallet that allow anyone to seamlessly receive payments from any token.Users can also mitigate the risks of price fluctuations in the cryptocurrency world with our derivative trading.

status_updates.description:
Kyber Ecosystem Report #5
We recently celebrated Ethereum's 4th birthday 🎂 and Kyber is very glad to be part of its amazing journey! In Ecosystem Report #5, we'd be sharing some notable events in both Ethereum and Kyber’s history, before diving into other interesting insights! 

Enjoy😊 https://blog.kyber.network/kyber-ecosystem-report-5-4f3a1b4c90af

Trust Wallet, the official Binance wallet, has natively integrated Kyber as part of its decentralized token exchange service, allowing even more seamless in-wallet token swaps for thousands of users around the world!

"The Kyber Protocol will give all Trust Wallet users more options to instantly trade their assets and tap into a large pool of ERC20 token liquidity." - Trust Wallet CEO Viktor Radchenko

Learn more: https://trustwallet.com/blog/trust-wallet-launches-multi-dex-support

DAOstack (GEN) will be available on Kyber Network on Tue, 11th June 9pm SGT (GMT+8) 

The token will be accessible through KyberSwap and other platforms that are tapping into our on-chain liquidity protocol. 

GEN will also play an important role in KyberDAO Experiment #2 on the DAOstack Alchemy platform.

Learn more: https://blog.kyber.network/daostack-gen-soon-available-on-kyber-network-27ad8e2b9834

Pundi X (NPXS) will be available on Kyber Network on Tue, 11th June 9pm GMT+8
NPXS will be accessible through KyberSwap and other platforms that are tapping into our protocol. 

KNC has also been added as a payment option in the Pundi X payment ecosystem, which includes XPOS, XPASS card and XWallet. KNC holders can now use KNC to buy clothes, shoes, drinks, and more across 25 countries in the world!

https://blog.kyber.network/pundi-x-npxs-soon-available-on-kyber-network-92f757a3f712

Happy Burn Day! 🔥To commemorate the burning of 1 million KNC, Kyber is giving away 15,000 KNC!

 12 Winners - To stand a chance to win:
🔹Trade more than 1 ETH worth of any token (per trade) through Kyber 
🔹7 Winners will be randomly selected to receive 1000 KNC
🔹Top 5 Traders in cumulated ETH value during the campaign win:
* 1st Prize: 3000 KNC
* 2nd Prize: 2000 KNC
* 3rd Prize: 1500 KNC
* 4th Prize: 1000 KNC
* 5th Prize: 500 KNC

Contest Period: 31 May 13:00 - 4 June 23:59 GMT+8

Kyber Ecosystem Report #2
In our Ecosystem Report #2, we look at the volume growth on April's top performing DApps, highlighted recent #DeFi integrations, and gave a shout-out to a few talented independent developers that have built on Kyber! ⭐️

Read our report: https://blog.kyber.network/kyber-ecosystem-report-2-bb0fdff5d962

Together with our new website, we release the first version of the Kyber protocol paper, where we formalize Kyber as a liquidity protocol that can be implemented on any smart contract-enabled blockchain to power on-chain token swaps. 

Learn more: https://blog.kyber.network/kyber-protocol-widening-kyber-adoption-across-blockchains-170e4051094d

Visit the new site: https://kyber.network/
